subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Wright broke open the game with a three-run homer in the third, and Xavier Nady and Paul Lo Duca added run-scoring hits as the Mets defeated the Blue Jays for their ninth consecutive road victory, a franchise record.
snippet: David Wright broke open the game with a three-run homer in the third, and Xavier Nady and Paul Lo Duca added run-scoring hits as the Mets defeated the Blue Jays for their ninth consecutive road victory, a franchise record.
